roleset.name: cause magical bad luck
roleset.note: JINX-V NOTES: Frames file for 'jinx' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from jinx.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: But [their study, which spanned the 1962-85 period,]-1 has since been shown [*-1]-86 to be jinxed [*-86] by an unlucky choice of data.
example.arg: by an unlucky choice of data
